title: Fontlab and MetricsMachine kerning exchange
content:
This FontLab tool allows to import and export kerning and classes between FontLab and MetricsMachine. [https://github.com/typedev/MMK\_FL\_kerning\_exchange](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414231816/https:/github.com/typedev/MMK_FL_kerning_exchange "https://github.com/typedev/MMK\_FL\_kerning\_exchange")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414231816im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FLMMKexchange_5624.jpg)
author: typedev
